DOC.brief_summary: Non-interventional study to obtain real life data from the treatment with Xalatan and Xalacom in Germany and to assess the long-term efficacy and tolerability under routine conditions. Data were entered into an electronic case report form.
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Study In Patients With Ocular Hypertension And Open Angle Glaucoma Treated With Xalatan And Xalacom
DOC.criteria: patients with ocular hypertension or glaucoma, defined by SmPC defined by SmPC
